trigger.title: Trigger: Changed Dimension
trigger.description: Triggers after the player travels between two dimensions.

conditions.title: Conditions
conditions.description: Object containing conditions that need to be met when the trigger gets activated. The criterion is marked completed when the trigger activates and all conditions passed.

from.title: From
from.description: The dimension the entity traveled from. This tag is a resource location for a dimension.

to.title: To
to.description: The dimension the entity traveled to. This tag is a resource location for a dimension.
